turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the specials here today at Papa John?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The specials here today at our Piqua Ohio location are many thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like what?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a 2 topping pizza large for $12.00.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Any other specials?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have 2 large 2 topping for $9.99 each.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Our last special is a medium one topping for $6.00.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay awesome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup, what can I get for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I take a large two topping pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like as your two toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get pepperoni & bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much are your garlic butter bread sticks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are $6.75.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay let me get those too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your total is $18.75.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will it be cash or credit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pay with cash.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. We will have your pizza out shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large pepperoni bacon pizza & garlic butter bread sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup, that's me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get some napkins?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup, no problem. Here you go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup, no problem. You have a nice day as well.
